files.patch:
@@ -34,0 +34,3 @@
+// Need this on windows to get the math constants (e.g., M_PI).
+#define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
+
@@ -35,0 +38,6 @@
+# include <fcntl.h>
+# include <float.h> // for _isnan
+# include <inttypes.h>
+# include <io.h>.   // for stream.cpp
+# include <limits.h>
+# include <math.h>
@@ -36,0 +45,1 @@
+# include <stddef.h>// for offsetof
@@ -37,0 +47,1 @@
+# include <stdio.h> // for va_list
@@ -39,1 +50,0 @@
-# include <stddef.h>// for offsetof
@@ -41,6 +51,0 @@
-# include <io.h>    // for stream.cpp
-# include <float.h> // for _isnan
-# include <stdio.h> // for va_list
-# include <fcntl.h>
-# include <inttypes.h>
-# include <limits.h>
@@ -48,3 +52,0 @@
-// Need this on windows to get the math constants (e.g., M_PI).
-#define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
-# include <math.h>
